text: As it's my first time working with HubSpot, I am integrating HubSpot with my voip calling app(i have developed it myself) and i found some difficulties while integrating (in developing/making iframe for call widgets) . Is there anyone who have done this before or can help me out?
Is it possible to sync HubSpot website page view activity to Salesforce? Or should I create a workflow for it (last page seen property value sync)?

Hey everyone :wave: - An old co-worker and I just launched a series of courses on how to design accessibility friendly design system components. If there are any developers who are looking to up-skill themselves on how to design Figma components that can easily slot into a design system, give me a shout or react to this message and I can reach out!

I used to work in a HubSpot agency, so I know how hard sometimes it can be to build something functional that also follows brand standards. Hence, here I am. It's been a passion project for a while.  We can offer some design/development support on components as well.

Hey <@U0420CVEL3A>! This offer sounds awesome but I'd ask that you keep all such offers to our <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> or <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> channel, as per our <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct#unwanted-solicitation-of-services|Code of Conduct>

Hey All
I am not able to put trial slash at the end of URL when pages are created as Dynamic HubDB Pages. Is there any work around for this?

Thanks
